Name: Hotel Grade
Description: This determines which hotel was awarded with what star rating from which authority. It also allows the rating to change from year to year.

Properties.Name: Awarded By
Properties.Description: The organization who awarded the stars (link back to the Hotel if self-awarded)

Properties.Name: Stars
Properties.Description: Number of 'stars' awarded to the Hotel

Properties.Name: Years Awarded
Properties.Description: The years in which this particular star rating was awarded to this hotel by this grading authority
